items.value: <color=red>Click this slot to sell 1 upgrade level!</color>

This upgrade slot doesn't have an upgrade in it!
You better get learnin'!

Life Restore
This will restore all your lives for this floor!

Life Restore<color=red>(Last one in stock!)</color>
This will restore all your lives for this floor!

Life Cap Increase
This will increase your max lives count by one for the rest of the game!
(Will not give you that life until the next floor unless your at max!)

Stamina Boost
For every one of these you have, you'll get +25 max stamina!
You only get the extra stamina when Baldi becomes active.

Auto Tag
When Baldi is done counting, you will automatically have a Faculty Nametag applied to you!

Auto Tag+
Have an automatically applied Faculty Nametag that lasts a whole minute!

Hungry Bully
This'll make Bully prefer to steal Zesty Bars from you!
If you have none, he'll take your BSODAs.
If you have none of those, he'll take your Apples!

Mrs. Pomp Timer Increase
This'll increase the time Mrs Pomp gives you to head to her class!

Grapple Upgrade
This'll allow grappling hooks to break through windows!

Grapple Upgrade
This'll allow grappling hooks to break through any lock!

Hyper Whistle
The whistle will make Principal even quicker for MORE instant justice!

Favoritism
The Principal's whistle will make nearby characters guilty and get them sent to detention!

Timefreeze Clock
When the Alarm Clock rings, time will be paused for 10 seconds!

Timefreeze Clock
When the Alarm Clock rings, time will be paused for 20 seconds!

Timefreeze Clock
When the Alarm Clock rings, time will be paused for 30 seconds!

Item Slot+
Add a permanent slot to your inventory!
Does not take up an upgrade slot!

Lucky Quarter
Whenever you use an item, there is a chance it'll be replaced with a quarter!
The likelyhood depends on how many of these you have!

Drink Efficiency
Increases the stamina when you drink from a fountain by 10% for every one of these you have!

Slow BSODA
Decreases the BSODA spray's speed by 15% for every one of these you have!

Slow BSODA Max
Decreases BSODA speed to 25% of its regular speed!

Reroll
Don't like whats in the shop? For a small price you can re-roll!

Free Exit
Sick of getting all the exits? This upgrade automatically does one for you!

Free Exit+
Sick of getting all the exits? This upgrade automatically does two for you!

Field Trip Redo
Allows you to redo a field trip the next time you die,
or as soon as you buy this upgrade if you've already done a field trip!

Birthday Luck
Increases the likelyhood of getting rare items from a Present!

????
Somethings gone wrong here... You shouldn't be seeing this...

Welcome to Johnny's Store!
Just click on upgrades you want to buy.
Or, click on an upgrade you already have to sell it! It's that easy!
